pullRequest.title: [DOCS] Add 'how to' doc about avoiding oversharding
pullRequest.bodyText:
Hi Elasticsearch writers! 👋
This relates to an issue in the elastic/cloud docs, which suggests we should port in @bczifra's  really excellent article about how to avoid oversharding. Since it's pertinent to Elasticsearch we thought it best to add here, and I can then link to the new content from the Cloud docs.
This is my first time pushing docs outside of the Cloud repos so I'd appreciate any help. In particular, I'm not sure about the back-porting process. The article seems applicable to all maintained versions of the ES docs.
